sentences.sContent: METHODS: Retinal vascular preparations were performed by using trypsin digestion and pepsin-trypsin digestion technique respectively.
sentences.sContent_eng: METHODS: Retinal vascular preparations were performed by using trypsin digestion and pepsin-trypsin digestion technique respectively.
sentences.sCn: 方法：分别用胰蛋白酶消化法及胃蛋白酶-胰蛋白酶联合消化法制备视网膜血管铺片，比较铺片成功率。

sentences.sContent: But while stomach acid is a factor, Dr. Koufman says, the real culprit for many patients is pepsin, a digestive enzyme that can exist in the esophagus.
sentences.sContent_eng: But while stomach acid is a factor, Dr. Koufman says, the real culprit for many patients is pepsin, a digestive enzyme that can exist in the esophagus.
sentences.sCn: 但考夫曼博士指出，胃酸只是其中的一个因素，胃蛋白酶才是很多患者的症结所在，这是可以存在于食道的一种消化酶。

sentences.sContent: The enzymolysis effect of neutral protease, papain, pepsin, bromelin, flavourzyme and compound protease was studied respectively on the sleeve-fish protein.
sentences.sContent_eng: The enzymolysis effect of neutral protease, papain, pepsin, bromelin, flavourzyme and compound protease was studied respectively on the sleeve-fish protein.
sentences.sCn: 探讨了中性蛋白酶、木瓜蛋白酶、胃蛋白酶、风味蛋白、酶菠萝蛋白酶以及复合蛋白酶对鱿鱼蛋白的酶解效果。

trans.tranOther: a liquid in your stomach that changes food into a form that your body can use
